/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their gray and white facades standing out against the blue sky. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. A solitary car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static landscape. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
